pergunta: The Delivery Lead should expect to receive the following from the Opportunity Team: (Risk,Solution_Contingency.pdf – pag.13)

alternativas.alternativa: For each High/Above Normal risk, a mitigation plan with ownership (by named individuals)
Solution Contingency assigned for risks that cannot be mitigated prior to contracting

pergunta: What is not a mandatory work product for System Integration Projects?
What is the biggest part of the TRUST equation?

alternativas.alternativa: There's a typo in the question (missing option)

pergunta: The Client has accountability for the roles and responsibilities that they have signed up for in the contract. What is not a best practice below?

alternativas.alternativa: Clearly document the Client’s roles and responsibilities in the contract.
During the Client Expectations meeting, review the roles and responsibilities with the Client.
Review the contract with the client on a monthly basis as a way of being proactive.
Be proactive in informing them what is required before it is needed – and impact if not delivered.
None of the above. All the above are best practices to ensure client accountability.

pergunta: Who owns the 'Risk' in a Fixed Fee Contract?

alternativas.alternativa: No one, Risk are eliminated with proper due diligence

pergunta: Which is not a characteristic of Waterfall (Choose two):

alternativas.alternativa: Plan as you go, flexible to changing requirements and priorities.
Value is delivered at the end with deployment to production.
Robust documentation lessens dependency on individuals.
Focus on working software over comprehensive documentation.

pergunta: What is not a true statement about daily scrum (choose two)?

alternativas.alternativa: An ad hoc meeting used to address issues and risks that arise on a daily basis.
It is a time to communicate/call out problems/impediments but not a time to solve problem.
Is a status meeting to ensure the project manager is up to date on the status.
A daily scrum is timeboxed regardless of the sprint length.

pergunta: What is not a responsibility of the Delivery Lead?

alternativas.alternativa: Managing day to day risks and issues

pergunta: Expectations between Accenture and Avanade are set by:

alternativas.alternativa: A formal meeting between Accenture and Avanade Delivery Leads during mobilization
An SP051 document that outlines Avanades responsibilities accepted by Accenture

pergunta: Solution contingency is a budgeted cost to cover risks that could not be mitigated prior to contracting. It is up to the Delivery Lead to use contingency at his/her descretion up to 20% of Budget. True or False
Metrics are captured in which tool?
The Solution Architect is responsible for handing over the Mobilization Starter Kit completed as transition into Project Delivery. True or False
Client Data Protection is the responsibility of the Security Officer. As a delivery lead, I am responsible only for ensuring my team has taken the CDP training. True or False
Issues log will have the following information: Title, Owner, Impact, Probability and Action Plan. True or False
If requirements are not managed in a controlled fashion, which statement describes all of the aspects of a program that could be impacted?

alternativas.alternativa: It impacts the project team delivery, which results in delays and frustration.
It impacts the quality of the solution delivered and budget, which results in over-runs.
It impacts the schedule and client relationships, which results in the project team's deliverables not being met and overall negative client satisfaction.
It impacts the scope, budget, and schedule of a project, which results in unmet client expectations.

pergunta: What are 2 settings you should set prior to starting to creating your WBS? (Select 2)
What is not an Agile Event?
What is the document we use to understand the commitment from ATC for staffing?
